amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-812 to provide for a sunset of amendments made to the Unfunded Mandates Reform Act and the Congressional Budget Act if GDP growth fails to increase at average annual rate of five percent or more.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
